modName: The book of Daedras and Aedras
summary: a book you can find it near the first legendary 3 stones first you quit helgen with rolof or hadvar this book can help you whell also + a new follower with the name DIOMEZAKH
descriptionHtml:
hello everyone im [B][I][COLOR=#938953][SIZE=4][FONT=Comic Sans MS]skull19972[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/I][/B]
 and this is my third mod

[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=4][FONT=Comic Sans MS][U][B]THE BOOK OF DAEDRIC DESCRIPTION[/B][/U][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]

this mod add a book and a follower [COLOR=#c00000][SIZE=4][FONT=Book Antiqua][I]DIOMEZAKH[/I][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR]
 he is the master of all daedras so he is the master of azura and clavicus ect... 
and the legend said that the first who find Diomezakh can become his follower
Diomezakh have lvl 150 he is 100 in conjuration and destruction and he is 100 in onehanded
You can find diamozakh near solitude see pic and you will find a letter near him

You can find the book of daedras near the 3 legendary stones first you quit helgen

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23719-1-1347816937.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23719-3-1347816938.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23719-2-1347740590.jpg[/img]



the book increases your lvl in conjuration 
also the book tell you where is the location of the daedras and ther rewards and many secrets to finish there quests also the reward they give you also how can you increases the lvl of there reward 
 so trust me you need that book 

the book have many true secrets to tell for example all the daedras are brothers and sisters so boethiah is the sister of hircine you can check it in internet  its a true story also stendarr was the teacher of talos its a true story also all the daedras and the divines are brothers exept talos they was borned from one mother and father fadomi and ahnuur its a true story also there is 4 forces in skyrim the thuum the ahnuur  the anuu and the Padomi created by fadomi and ahnuur its a true story and there is many other secrets to tell in that book 
goodbye evryone im your freind [B][I][COLOR=#938953][SIZE=4][FONT=Comic Sans MS]skull19972[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/I][/B]
 and once again im sorry about my bad english

[I][COLOR=#548dd4][SIZE=3][FONT=Arial][B]ENJOY[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/I]
!!!!

Check out my First mod and my second mod 
1) The book of Cheats : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23717 it add a new book obtain all cheats and codes and skyrim secrets

2) Better skyforge and Ysgramor temple : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23727
How can skyforge be legendary without a workbensh ?
 my second mod  improve skyforge and give it a workbensh and a smelter also the companions must have the shrine of ysgramor so that put the ysgramor statue in skyforge


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23719-4-1347816938.jpg[/img]
